title: Server for Cambodia
body:
I just want to know which server is the best for Cambodia because last few years the Pings was playable 160ms now it's 260 and even worst 300ms. 
I don't want to play on Gerena server cuz i like the NA server. So what can i do to get a better experiance of playing League. 
Send from Cambodia
Sorry for my bad English
Any suggestion will be considered

replies.body: Since the physical location for the NA servers is so far away, it's no surprise that you're having a few ping problems. You may have a bit of a better time on the Russian server since it's a good amount closer.
